weeklyRewards.remark: Yeah, great job! Your reward is:

weeklyRewards.remark: One of the rewards of success is freedom, the ability to do whatever you like! Your reward is:

weeklyRewards.remark: A balanced budget happens one day at a time! Your reward is:

item.action: Use this to help your plants grow (x2)

weeklyRewards.remark: Success leaves clues, and if you sow the same seeds, you'll reap the same rewards. Your reward is:

item.title: corn
item.action: Corn will make a nice addition to the garden

weeklyRewards.remark: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit. Your reward is:

item.title: cucumber
item.action: Cucumbers are now in your garden

weeklyRewards.remark: eggplant

item.title: Happiness is not a reward - it is a consequence. Suffering is not a punishment - it is a result. Your reward is:
item.action: Eggplant is now in your garden

weeklyRewards.remark: The rewards for those who persevere far exceed the pain that must precede the victory. Your reward is:

item.title: tomato
item.action: Enjoy your new tomatoes

weeklyRewards.remark: When we take time to notice the things that go right - it means we're getting a lot of little rewards throughout the day. Your reward is:

item.title: watermelon
item.action: Watermelon is now in your garden

weeklyRewards.remark: What people want most of all are social rewards, especially the respect of their peers.

item.title: carrot
item.action: The garden now has carrots

weeklyRewards.remark: A balanced budget happens one day at a time! Your reward is:

item.title: red bell pepper
item.action: Enjoy your red bell peppers

weeklyRewards.remark: Being in control of your finances is a great stress reliever! Your reward is:

item.title: yellow bell pepper

weeklyRewards.remark: One of the rewards of success is freedom, the ability to do whatever you like! Your reward is:

item.title: red pepper

item.title: cilantro

weeklyRewards.remark: Yeah, great job! Your reward is:

item.title: basil

weeklyRewards.remark: It takes a village to make this garden! Your reward is:

item.title: mint

weeklyRewards.remark: Keep calm and save money. Your reward is:

item.title: blueberries
item.action: Enjoy the new blueberries

weeklyRewards.remark: Set goals that are achievable and know what motivates you and stay focused on that. Your reward is:

item.title: strawberries
item.action: Your garden now has strawberries

weeklyRewards.remark: If you're looking for immediate rewards, you're only looking for the money. Today you saw past that! Your reward is:

item.title: grapevine
item.action: Grapes are now in your garden

weeklyRewards.remark: I've usually found that the greatest rewards in my life come from taking on things that are a little bit scary. Your reward is:

item.title: leeks
item.action: Leeks are now in your garden

weeklyRewards.remark: What I am suggesting is hard work and it can be slow work, but the rewards are well worth it. Your reward is:

item.title: saffron
item.action: Enjoy your new saffron blossom

weeklyRewards.remark: In nature there are neither rewards nor punishments; there are consequences. Ok but we think you deserve something, your reward is:

item.title: pineapple
item.action: Pineapple is now in your garden
